DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine once-weekly prophylaxis regimen BeneFIX subject moderately severe severe Hemophilia B safe effective .
DOC.brief_title: Study To Compare On-Demand Treatment To A Prophylaxis Regimen Of BeneFIX In Subjects With Moderately Severe Severe Hemophilia B
DOC.criteria: Documented history moderatelysevere severe hemophilia B ( FIX activity < /=2 % ) . Male subject , age 12 year 65 year . Subjects least 100 exposure day ( EDs ) factor IX product . Subjects minimum 12 bleed episode , 6 must joint bleeds , 12month period Screening visit . Subjects received FIX primary secondary prophylaxis regimen within last 12 month prior Screening visit . Subjects major surgery orthopedic surgical procedure within past 3 month prior Screening visit . Subjects major surgery orthopedic surgery plan within duration study participation . Subjects past history , current FIX inhibitor , define > ULN ( upper limit normal ) report laboratory . Subjects know hypersensitivity FIX product hamster protein .
